tag2: As Used by Governments for Top Secret Purpose
text:
postilotta in combination with a non-compromised device yield a highly secure messaging service.

postilotta can increase security levels even more by adding an independent AES encryption layer in the ExtraSecure Mode.

Extra Secure Mode best practice:
list:
• Type in a passphrase and watchword above.
  • Get the generated activation-link (e.g. via QRCode).
  • Use another device at another access point and visit the activation-link within 48h.
  • Type in your passphrase and if the site can respond with your watchword, the additional security layer has been established.
ifnot: If the site does not answer correctly, there may have been a breach in message security. Please stop the current messaging process and initiate a new Extra Secure Session to ensure the highest level of messaging security.
